sentences.english: Visitors at Tongniuling can have a bird's- eye view of the entire development zone.
sentences.chinese: 游客可以在童牛岭俯瞰开发区的全貌。

sentences.english: From the top of Lianhua Moutain, you can have a bird's eye view of the CBD of Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 从莲花山顶，你可以鸟瞰深圳中心商务区的全貌。

sentences.english: Often, talking to scientists alone will not give you the full picture.
sentences.chinese: 通常，通过与科学家单独讨论，不会得到故事的全貌。

sentences.english: None of this criticism is wrong, but it is hardly a rounded picture.
sentences.chinese: 批评无一不实，但难窥其全貌。

sentences.english: We had a great view of the Forbidden City from a roof-top bar.
sentences.chinese: 还有幸从一个屋顶酒吧鸟瞰紫禁城的全貌。

sentences.english: Standing Yantai mountain, overlooking the Yantai can picture.
sentences.chinese: 站在烟台山上，可尽览烟台市全貌。

sentences.english: so I think that people just want to come and see all of it and be a part of it.
sentences.chinese: 所以我想人们想过来看看全貌，参与其中。

sentences.english: At the top of the Harmony Tower, you may enjoy a birds-eye view over the whole Expo site.
sentences.chinese: 登上和谐塔，您可以俯瞰上海世博会的园区全貌。

sentences.english: A wonderful panorama of the Ararat valley.
sentences.chinese: 这里可以看到亚拉拉特山美丽的全貌。

sentences.english: The image above shows the ancient Egyptian city of Tanis.
sentences.chinese: 上面这幅照片显示出古埃及城市Tanis的全貌。

sentences.english: The silvan panorama of large area is OK express in detail from inside a chart.
sentences.chinese: 大面积的森林全貌可以从一份图表中详尽地表示出来。

sentences.english: You can have a good view of this area from the summits of nearby fells .
sentences.chinese: 从附近的山顶上，你可以很好地看到这个地区的全貌。

sentences.english: General view of Le Mont Saint Michel under snow, Thursday, Dec. 2, 2010. AP / David Vincent
sentences.chinese: 圣米切尔山在雪下的全貌。

sentences.english: And yet that might miss the sum total of what made up Su Tungpo.
sentences.chinese: 可是这些也许还不足以勾绘出苏东坡的全貌。

sentences.english: As we merge onto the highway, we rarely see the big picture.
sentences.chinese: 当行驶在公路上时，我们很少能看到事情的全貌。

sentences.english: Southern-eastern Asia is a epitome of the world.
sentences.chinese: 东南亚是世界的一个缩影，从它可窥知世界的全貌。

definition: to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
to overlook/to look down from a height
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
bird's-eye view/see also 鳥瞰圖|鸟瞰图[niao3 kan4 tu2]
to cover all at one glance (idiom)/a panoramic view
to view/to look at/to look sth over
to travel to a place personally (idiom)
